for query SELECT wp_posts.ID, wp_posts.post_title, (SELECT wp_postmeta.meta_value FROM wp_postmeta WHERE wp_postmeta.post_id = wp_posts.ID AND wp_postmeta.meta_key = '_stock' LIMIT 1) as _stock, (SELECT wp_postmeta.meta_value FROM wp_postmeta WHERE wp_postmeta.post_id = wp_posts.ID AND wp_postmeta.meta_key = '_stock_status' LIMIT 1) as _stock_status, (SELECT wp_postmeta.meta_value FROM wp_postmeta WHERE wp_postmeta.post_id = wp_posts.ID AND wp_postmeta.meta_key = '_regular_price' LIMIT 1) as _regular_price, (SELECT wp_postmeta.meta_value FROM wp_postmeta WHERE wp_postmeta.post_id = wp_posts.ID AND wp_postmeta.meta_key = '_sale_price' LIMIT 1) as _sale_price, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS(':' , t.term_id, t.name)) FROM wp_term_relationships tr INNER JOIN wp_term_taxonomy tt ON tr.term_taxonomy_id = tt.term_taxonomy_id INNER JOIN wp_terms t ON t.term_id = tt.term_id WHERE tr.object_id = wp_posts.ID AND tt.taxonomy = 'product_type' LIMIT 1) as product_type From wp_posts WHERE wp_posts.post_type IN ('product','product_variation') AND wp_posts.post_status IN ('publish') GROUP BY wp_posts.ID ORDER BY wp_posts.post_date ASC LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0 made by require_once('wp-load.php'), require_once('wp-config.php'), require_once('wp-settings.php'), do_action('init'), WP_Hook->do_action, WP_Hook->apply_filters, StockSyncWithGoogleSheetForWooCommerce\Hooks->check_ssgsw_synced, StockSyncWithGoogleSheetForWooCommerce\Product->sync_all, StockSyncWithGoogleSheetForWooCommerce\Product->get_all_products, StockSyncWithGoogleSheetForWooCommerce\Product->get_formatted_data, StockSyncWithGoogleSheetForWooCommerce\Product->get_raw_data, WP_SQLite_DB->query, WP_SQLite_DB->print_error
